name: Viridis
description: Viridis is an electric-powered drone-racer that has become the latest craze in the cyberpunk world. Its cutting-edge technology and lightning-fast speed have made it the envy of racers around the globe. Taking on the challenge of abandoned industrial zones, Viridis has become the top choice for daredevil-style races, soaring through the air with amazing agility and lightning-fast responsiveness. All who challenge it come away in awe of its abilities as it outmaneuvers its competitors and dominates the racing scene.
